name: dcm2niix
description: Chris Rorden's dcm2niiX - DICOM to NIfTI converter. Converts DICOM files to NIfTI format with optional BIDS sidecar generation.
author: Chris Rorden

inputs.name: Input directory
inputs.description: Input folder containing DICOM files. Will be searched recursively based on depth parameter.

inputs.name: Compression level
inputs.description: gz compression level (1=fastest..9=smallest)

inputs.name: Adjacent DICOMs
inputs.description: Adjacent DICOMs (images from same series always in same folder) for faster conversion

inputs.name: BIDS sidecar
inputs.description: Generate BIDS sidecar JSON files (o=only: no NIfTI)

inputs.name: Anonymize BIDS
inputs.description: Anonymize BIDS sidecar files by removing personal information

inputs.name: Comment
inputs.description: Comment stored in NIfTI aux_file (up to 24 characters)

inputs.name: Search depth
inputs.description: Directory search depth for DICOM files in sub-folders

inputs.name: Export format
inputs.description: Export format: NRRD (y), MGH (o), JSON/JNIfTI (j), or BJNIfTI (b)

inputs.name: Filename template
inputs.description: Output filename template (%a=antenna, %b=basename, %c=comments, %d=description, %e=echo number, %f=folder name, %g=accession number, %i=ID of patient, %j=seriesInstanceUID, %k=studyInstanceUID, %m=manufacturer, %n=name of patient, %o=mediaObjectInstanceUID, %p=protocol, %r=instance number, %s=series number, %t=time, %u=acquisition number, %v=vendor, %x=study ID; %z=sequence name)

inputs.name: Generate defaults
inputs.description: Generate defaults file (o=only: reset and write defaults; i=ignore: reset defaults)

inputs.name: Ignore derived images
inputs.description: Ignore derived, localizer and 2D images

inputs.name: Integer scaling
inputs.description: Losslessly scale 16-bit integers (y=scale, n=no but uint16->int16, o=original)

inputs.name: Merge 2D slices
inputs.description: Merge 2D slices from same series regardless of echo, exposure, etc. (0=no, 1=yes, 2=auto)

inputs.name: Series number
inputs.description: Only convert specified series CRC number (can be used up to 16 times)

inputs.name: Output directory
inputs.description: Output directory (omit to save to input folder)

inputs.name: Philips scaling
inputs.description: Use Philips precise float (not display) scaling

inputs.name: Search mode
inputs.description: Search mode (y=show number of DICOMs, l=list DICOMs, n=no)

inputs.name: Rename only
inputs.description: Rename instead of convert DICOMs

inputs.name: Single file mode
inputs.description: Single file mode, do not convert other images in folder

inputs.name: Update check
inputs.description: Check for newer versions

inputs.name: Verbose output
inputs.description: Verbose output (0=no, 1=yes, 2=logorrheic)

inputs.name: Conflict behavior
inputs.description: Write behavior for name conflicts (0=skip, 1=overwrite, 2=add suffix)

inputs.name: Crop 3D
inputs.description: Crop 3D acquisitions (i=ignore: neither crop nor rotate)

inputs.name: Compression
inputs.description: gz compress images (y=pigz, o=optimal pigz, i=internal:zlib, n=no, 3=no,3D)

inputs.name: Byte order
inputs.description: Byte order (y=big-end, n=little-end, o=optimal/native)

inputs.name: Progress information
inputs.description: Slicer format progress information

inputs.name: Ignore trigger times
inputs.description: Disregard values in 0018,1060 and 0020,9153

inputs.name: Terse output
inputs.description: Omit filename post-fixes (can cause overwrites)

inputs.name: XML output
inputs.description: Output Slicer format features

groups.name: Output Options
groups.description: Options controlling output file format and location

groups.name: BIDS Options
groups.description: Options related to BIDS sidecar generation

groups.name: Processing Options
groups.description: Options affecting how DICOM data is processed
